summary:
After graduating in business and economics I started my career in the financial and insurance world first as a private consultant and then as a sales manager for companies that distributed insurance and financial products through banks. I have had dealings with various banks, savings, popular and  cooperative credit banksI have managed all the phases of the distribution of products tailored according to the needs of the banks, phases ranging from training the salespeople to controlling the sales themselves. In my activity as sales manager I always focused on the client, reconciling the budget needs of the companies I represented with those of the final customer.
After almost twenty years as a sales manager I followed my passion (volunteering) that I did in my free time and I moved to Auroville (India), a city devoted to volunteering. In Auroville I managed the purchases and internal organization of the cooperative created to distribute food and household products to the members. I co-managed an activity that sold ready-made Italian products (such as sauces and jams).

In 2018 I came back to Europe taking into account my experience in management and customer service.

school.name: IFOA - Training Institute of Corporate Professionals

education.field_of_study: Corso di formazione per funzionario tecnico- commerciale

profile_positions.description:
My duty is to support sales activities in the Italian market such as maintaining and updating relationships with area managers about commercial and administrative issues, carrying out the administrative tasks necessary to complete the sales. I keep on constant dialogue with the area managers for possible problems or difficulties that may occur about the territory and act as a referent between the various areas involved within the company.

My duty is to support sales activities in the Italian market such as maintaining and updating relationships with area managers about commercial and administrative issues, carrying out the administrative tasks necessary to complete the sales. I keep on constant dialogue with the area managers for possible problems or difficulties that may occur about the territory and act as a referent between the various areas involved within the company.
profile_positions.title: Sales Back Office

profile_positions.description:
I was volunteer at Auroville in the purchasing and organizing management of the Pour Tous Distribution Center that  is the main distribution center for food and home products, having 1800 members out of 2500 community members. I was co-manager about the financial structure as whole. I started as a volunteer in the internal kitchen that gives a food service.
Auroville is a well-known community in the world of volunteering and, as a matter of fact, lots of young and not young people are coming every year from all over the world to help to  build a city founded on ethical values both in commerce and in everyday life.
I was  also volunteer in the core-group of the Italian Pavilion, an organization that creates and manages cultural events of our country in Auroville with the aim of supporting our culture.
I was also a member of ABC, a dedicated group to supporting non-profit work in Auroville.
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
I was the Sales Manager in the center of Italy at Assimoco Group, the insurance company of the cooperative association. The group is composed of Assimoco S.p.A. and Assimoco Vita S.p.A. meaning two companies that offer their products within an active collaboration with the Cooperative Credit Banks and through a network of traditional agencies and cooperatives spread across the country. I coordinated the activities of bank accountants in the sale of insurance products, from training in classrooms to the management of sales-related activities.
I also managed to open new collaborations with new clients (banks), in the world of cooperative credit.
Essentially, Assimoco is concerned with the protection of family and business.
This company was also an educational opportunity in my extra-working life. The constant contact with the Cooperative Credit Banks, the specific working environment in which they operate, has linked me to the medium and small business of our country, the ones made of credible aspirations coupled with the ability to create work. My Umbrian roots, my peasant origins, and my idea of family  as an evolutionary unit in life and work, have emerged, giving a boost to my life that will then evolve into a volunteer activity where I will carry with me my work experience.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager of  Italy's Center Area

profile_positions.description:
Skandia Vita, a Skandia group company in Italy since 1997, focuses its business on strategic and operational consultation in the creation of  insurance policy named Unit Linked.
I have supported individual partners (banks and networks of financial promoters located in Tuscany, Umbria, Marche, Lazio, Abruzzo and Molise) in building custom solutions based on the strategic goals of the partners themselves.
I coordinated Skandia Vita's internal offices for product realization, so I took care of the launch at the sales network.
I was a part, in collaboration with the central banks and financial advisors networks, in making  sales budgets and their achievement. I also was a trainer of the sales network.
I have coordinated a group of sales people as well, devoted to assisting bank branches involved in selling the product.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager of Center and South Area's  Italy

profile_positions.description:
The Consorform Group of Teramo, a consortium of companies formed by the most important Abruzzi business organizations for financial and credit support, as well as for their professional training.
For this company, I gave consultation to  the associates in the submission of funding requests, supported by the guarantee of the Fidi consortiums of the group, at local banks.
Later, I had the job of teaching a training course for business operators.
profile_positions.title: Consultant and Teacher

profile_positions.description:
NBI Broker Bankassurance Company belonging to the GPA Group, an insurance broker based in Milan.
For this company I coordinated the sales of insurance products belonging to the life business at the branches of Banca Popolare dell'Adriatico in Abruzzo and the Marche.
I have been involved in the training and assistance to the sale of the securities traders of the individual branches, in relation to the budgets previously agreed with the bank's trading direction.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Assistent

profile_positions.description:
I start my financial promoter business for Ambro Italia. Perugia branch
Customer research and sales of insurance and financial products distributed by the same company.
profile_positions.title: Promotore Finanziario
